name: Honey Glazed Carrots
author: Sunny Anderson
instructions: In a medium saucepan, bring water to a boil.
Add salt and then carrots and cook until tender, 5 to 6 minutes.
Drain the carrots and add back to pan with butter, honey and lemon juice.
Cook until a glaze coats the carrots, 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper and garnish with parsley.
notes: Miso Glazed Carrots variation: For 3 lb carrots sliced on the bias, blanch 2-3 min. In a roaster pan, heat 1/4 cup oil, add carrots and cook over high heat until browned (about 5 minutes). Mix 1/2 cup red miso paste with 6 TB butter, 1 TB brown sugar and half of 1 cup sliced scallions. Add to carrots and toss to coat. Roast at 425Â°F for 20 minutes, stir in rest of scallions and serve.
